title: User sees a clear entry point to Folder upload from the sidebar + New menu
description: Verifies the discoverability of the Folder upload action in the + New menu on the dashboard.

steps.description: Click on the "+ New" button in the sidebar
Verify the "+ New" menu is visible

title: Restore a trashed file and confirm it returns to the dashboard
description: Verifies restoring a file from Trash returns it to the main dashboard listing.
category: File Management (Rename, Star, Trash, Restore, Delete)

steps.description: Verify at least one trashed file row is visible
Click on "Restore" for a trashed file
Click on "Dashboard" in the sidebar navigation
Verify the restored file is visible in the file list

title: Permanently delete a trashed file and confirm it is removed from Trash
description: Verifies permanently deleting a file from Trash removes it from the Trash list after confirming the action.
category: File Management (Rename, Star, Trash, Restore, Delete)

steps.description: Verify at least one trashed file row is visible
Click on "Delete permanently" for a trashed file
Verify the deleted file is not visible in the trash list

title: Create a new folder from the Dashboard root
description: Verifies a user can create a folder using the Create > New Folder modal and see it listed in the current view.

steps.description: Type "E2E Test Folder" into the folder name field
Verify text "E2E Test Folder" is visible

title: Prevent folder creation when the name is blank
description: Verifies the New Folder modal blocks creation and shows a visible validation message when the name is empty.

title: Cancel folder creation from the New Folder modal
description: Verifies a user can close the New Folder modal without creating a folder and the folder does not appear in the list.

steps.description: Type "Folder Should Not Be Created" into the folder name field
Verify element "New Folder" is not visible
Verify text "Folder Should Not Be Created" is not visible

title: Open supported file preview in modal and see preview UI
description: Verifies that clicking a supported file opens the preview modal and shows inline preview controls.

steps.description: Click on a file card that appears to be an image (for example, a thumbnail image file)

title: Open full-page preview from preview modal
description: Verifies that the user can navigate from the preview modal to the full-page preview route.

steps.description: Click on a file card that appears to be previewable (for example, an image with a thumbnail)
Click on "Open full page" (or "Full preview") in the preview modal

title: Close preview modal returns to dashboard file list
description: Verifies the modal can be closed and the user returns to the dashboard list view.

steps.description: Click on a file card that appears to be previewable
Click on "Close" in the preview modal

title: Full-page preview route shows preview page shell for a file opened via modal
description: Verifies the full-page preview remains usable when reached from the modal and shows basic preview actions.

steps.description: Click on a file card that appears to be previewable
Click on "Open full page" (or "Full preview") in the preview modal

title: Create a public share link with default settings
description: Verifies a user can open the Share dialog from a file context menu and create a share link successfully.

steps.description: Click on a file item in the file list to focus/select it
Click the "More" or "Actions" button for the selected file to open the context menu
Click "Create link" or "Create" in the Share dialog

title: Create a share link with an expiry set
description: Verifies a user can set an expiry option (if available) and still create a share link.

steps.description: Click on a file item in the file list to focus/select it
Click the "More" or "Actions" button for the selected file to open the context menu
Select an expiry option (for example "1 day" or "7 days") from the expiry dropdown
Click "Create link" or "Create" in the Share dialog

title: Create a share link with a max downloads limit set
description: Verifies a user can set a maximum downloads limit (if available) and still create a share link.

steps.description: Click on a file item in the file list to focus/select it
Click the "More" or "Actions" button for the selected file to open the context menu
Click "Create link" or "Create" in the Share dialog

title: Open a share link and view public file metadata
description: Verifies a token-based share page can be accessed without login and shows the shared file details.

steps.description: Click on a file item in the file list to focus/select it
Click the "More" or "Actions" button for the selected file to open the context menu
Click "Create link" or "Create" in the Share dialog
Click the visible share link text (the "/share/..." link) to open the share page in the same tab

title: Validate max downloads field rejects invalid input
description: Verifies the Share dialog prevents creating a link when max downloads is invalid (for example zero or non-numeric).

steps.description: Click on a file item in the file list to focus/select it
Click the "More" or "Actions" button for the selected file to open the context menu
Click "Create link" or "Create" in the Share dialog
Verify text "Link created" is not visible
